channel.title: Posts on Cherry's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Cherry's Blog

item.title: (format t "Hello World~%")
item.description: Nice that you’re here! I’ll be trying to post both personal and tech related stuff, the idea is to keep me writing more constantly.

item.title: Native Fuzzy Finder in Neovim With Lua and Cool Bindings
item.description: Since I read a particular blog post by yobibyte about a minimalist approach to neovim configuration I started to think more about how much stuff do I really need for my config to work properly. This is my current state where i’m trying to remove as much plugins as possible and use more native behaviors from latest neovim and I hope my recent findings about fuzzy finding can be useful to you reading!
